tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ingredient_substitutions ( 
    ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    substitution_name TEXT, 
    substitution_description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE recipe_variations (
    variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT,
    variation_name VARCHAR(255),
    ingredients_list TEXT,
    steps_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ingredient_substitutions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    original_ingredient VARCHAR(255),
    substitute_ingredient VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE recipe_variations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT, 
    variation_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ingredient_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT, 
    ingredient_id INT,
    quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
    unit VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Recipe_Ingredient (recipe_id INT,
                         ingredient_id INT,
                         quantity INT,
                         FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipe(recipe_id),
                         FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredient(ingredient_id));

CREATE TABLE Substitution (substitution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                      original_ingredient_id INT,
                      substitute_ingredient_id INT,
                      FOREIGN KEY (original_ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredient(ingredient_id),
                      FOREIGN KEY (substitute_ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredient(ingredient_id));

CREATE TABLE ingredient_substitutions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  original_ingredient VARCHAR,
  substituted_ingredient VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE recipe_variations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_id INT,
  variation_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ingredient_properties (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ingredient_id INT,
  property_name VARCHAR,
  property_value VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_id INT,
  ingredient_id INT,
  quantity DECIMAL,
  unit_of_measurement VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE ingredient_allergens (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  allergen_name VARCHAR,
  ingredient_id INT
)
